src_original: tau saṃprasthitau /  anyatamasya puruṣasya niṣpalāyate baḍavā /  tena daṇḍī ucyate dhāraya me etāṃ baḍavām* /  kathaṃ dhārayāmi /
tgt_original: [ tatas ] tena [ daṇḍinā aśvāgatirodhārtha ] upalaḥ kaścij jagṛhe aśvāṃ [ prati ] nicikṣipe ca [; ]

src_original: yathā śaknoṣi /  tena pāṣāṇaṃ gṛhītvā śirasi prahāro dattaḥ /  sā kālagatā /
tgt_original: [ sa copalaḥ ] aśvāyāḥ padamekamāhatya [ tad ] babhañja |

src_original: sa puruṣaḥ kathayati /  tvayā me baḍavā praghātitā /  prayaccha māṃ baḍavām* /
tgt_original: tena [ janena ] jagade - “ yatastvayā turagā mama māritā'taḥ pratidehi [ me ] mamā'śvām “ [ iti ] |

src_original: (fol. 172v1 = GBM 6.1013) kasyārthaṃ baḍavāṃ dadāmi /
tgt_original: [ daṇḍinoktam - ] “ kasya hetoraśvāṃ dāsyāmi ?“ [ iti ] |

src_original: sa kathayati /
tgt_original: [ janena ] tenā''kāritam - “ ihāgaccha |

src_original: āgacchādarśamukhasya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gacchāvaḥ /
tgt_original: nṛpasya savidhe ca vrajāva |

src_original: so 'smākaṃ vyavahāraṃ gopayiṣyati /
tgt_original: [ sa ] āvayorvicāraniṣpattiṃ kariṣyatī “ ti |

src_original: te tatra saṃprasthitāḥ /
tgt_original: tadā tau jagmatuśca |

src_original: sa daṇḍī niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ /  tena prākārasyopariṣṭād ātmā muktaḥ /
tgt_original: [ tato vairibhayāt ] sa daṇḍī palāyitumārebhe |  [ apasaraṇāvasare ] sa ca kasyacit kuḍayasyādhastād avapupluve |

src_original: tasyādhastāt kuvindo vastraṃ sūyamānas tasyopari (MSV I 117) patitaḥ /
tgt_original: tasya puratastantuvāyaḥ kaścit tantūn saṃvāyāsīnaḥ |  tasya [ kuvindasya ] upariṣṭāt [ daṇḍī ] papāta |

src_original: kuvindaḥ praghātitaḥ /
tgt_original: sa ca tantuvāyaḥ kālagataḥ |

src_original: daṇḍī kuvindapatnyā gṛhītaḥ /
tgt_original: [ tatas ] tantuvāyasya bhāryayā sa daṇḍī [ kare ] dadhre |

src_original: tvayā mama svāmī praghātitaḥ /
tgt_original: [ sā ] uvāca - “ yatastvayā mama bhartā nihataḥ [ ataḥ ] pratiyaccha me bhartāram “ iti |

src_original: jayena yenādarśamukho rājā tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /  upasaṃkramya daṇḍī rājānaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
tgt_original: [ tatas ] te [ sarve ] gatvā ca narapateḥ sannidhiṃ prāpuḥ |

src_original: te 'py amī pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
tgt_original: te bhūbhṛtaścaraṇe  śiṃrasā praṇemuḥ [, ]  ekapārśve [ ca ] niṣeduḥ |

src_original: rājā daṇḍinaṃ pṛcchati /  kim āgato 'si /  devānīto 'smīti /
tgt_original: tataśca bhūpatiṃnā te papracchire - “ kiṃmarthaṃ yūyamāgatāḥ “ iti |  [ tadā ] taiḥ sarvairdaṇḍigṛhapatyorvivādo [ rājñe ] vivṛtaḥ |

src_original: kena kāraṇena /  daṇḍinā gṛhapatinā saha vivādas tat sarvam ārocitam* /
tgt_original: [ tad vivaraṇamākarṇya ] bhūpena daṇḍī babhāṣe - “ kiṃ tvayā vṛṣo dhārita ?“ itiṃ |  [ daṇḍī giramādade - ] “ atha kiṃm “ [ iti ] |

src_original: rājā gṛhapatiṃ pṛcchati /  dṛṣṭas tvayā balīvadaḥ /  dṛṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: [ rājovāca - ] “ yāvat pratiyaccha [ vṛṣabham ] |  [ tathā ] pratidehi yathā gṛhapatinā [ puṃgavaḥ pratyarṇaṇakāle ] dṛśyate “ [ iti ] |

src_original: daṇḍin tvayā balīvardā praveśitāḥ /  deva praveśitāḥ /
tgt_original: [ daṇḍayuvāca - ] “ sasambodhanaṃ hi na [ vṛṣo gṛhapataye prati - ] dattaḥ “ [ iti ] |

src_original: rājā kathayati /
tgt_original: narādhipenoddhoṣitam - “ yato'munā daṇḍinā''bhāṣaṇamantareṇa vṛṣabhaḥ

src_original: asya daṇḍino jihvāṃ chindata yena nārocitam* /
tgt_original: pratidade [ ato'sya ] rasanāṃ chindhi |

src_original: asyāpi netroddharaṇaṃ kuruta yena balīvardā nopanibaddhāḥ /
tgt_original: yato hi gṛhasvāmī vṛṣamāgacchantaṃ  paśyannapiṃ na babandha [ ato'sya ] nayanam [ ekam ] utpāṭaye “ ti |

src_original: gṛhapatiḥ kathayati /
tgt_original: gṛhapatiṃnoce - “ prathamato mama vṛṣo daṇḍinā nāśitaḥ |

src_original: ekadā me balīvardā hṛtā aparaṃ netroddharaṇaṃ kriyate /  daṇḍinā jitaṃ bhavatu /
tgt_original: dvitīyato mama nayanāpanayanaṃ yato varamato [ vivāde ] daṇḍyeva jayī bhavatu “ [ iti ] |

src_original: sa puruṣaḥ kathayati /  deva anena daṇḍinā mama baḍavā praghātitā /
tgt_original: janena kenacit [ turaṅgamākhāminā ] ūce - “ deva daṇḍinā mamāśvā mārite “ ti |

src_original: rājā kathayati /  asya puruṣasya jihvāṃ chindata yenoktaṃ yathā śaknoṣi tathā vārayeti /
tgt_original: narapatinoce - “ aśvapatinā'śvā [ bandhanān ] na mociteti hetorasya rasanāṃ chindhi |

src_original: asyāpi daṇḍino hastau ardhāpayata yenānyena śakyaṃ tāṃ dhārayituṃ nānyatra śilāprahārayā /
tgt_original: daṇḍinopalo  nicikṣipa iti bāhum [ asyaikaṃ ] kṛndhi “ [ iti ] |  janena tena [ saptipatinā ] proktam - “ prathamato mama ghoṭakī hatā |

src_original: ekadā me baḍavā praghātitā dvitīyaṃ ye jihvācchedaḥ /  daṇḍinā jitaṃ bhavatu /
tgt_original: jiṃhvā me chetsyate varamato daṇḍayeva jayī bhavatu “ [ iti ] |

src_original: kuvindapatnyā vistareṇārocitam* /  rājā kathayati /
tgt_original: [ tatas ] tantuvāyasya bhāryayā babhāṣe - “ bhartā me daṇḍinā hataḥ “ [ iti ] |

src_original: ekadā anena mama bhartā praghātito 'para eṣa me svāmī bhaviṣyati /  daṇḍinā jitaṃ bhavatu /  vardhakinā vistareṇārocitam* /
tgt_original: [ tena ca ] antarāle āsīno'dṛṣṭo janaḥ [ kuvindo ] nihataḥ “ [ iti ] |

src_original: rājā kathayati /
tgt_original: narapatinoce - “[ tad ] gaccha ,
